name: Blade Gunner 2022
description:
Note: The web version only works in chrome based browsers due to an itch.io limitation.

The notorious Blade Gunner roams the rooftops of this dark city, trying to escape the drones and agents following her. Your task is to help her survive and become the most powerful Blade Gunner she can be!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/blade-gunner-2022

Controls Keyboard

Move: WASD  
Aim: Mouse  
Shoot: Left Click  
Dodge: Space  
Use ultimate: E

Gamepad

Move: Left stick 
Aim: Right stick  
Shoot: Right bumper  
Dodge: Left bumper 
Use ultimate: Y
